column4: ok i dunno whats going on i cannot download a new browser i cannot empty my trash can what do i do
ok i dunno whats going on i cannot download a new browser i cannot empty my trash can what do i do its like i got a virus or something save me please
no messages and yes it says my hard drive is full thats why i tried dumping trash can
all 80 gigs its my only os
yes my drive is full why can't i delete stuff
check in Home /.local/share/Trash
maybe you can delete some files manually from there
did you check in that location?
yes it will not delete anywhere when i try it freazes
mmm  open a terminal and cd  /home/yourname/.local/share/Trash  then do ls   and try  sudo rm -rf nameoffile
can you delete any useless. info at all?  movies   music etc ?  or can you back some of them up.?
did you try    sudo rm -rf ~/.local/share/Trash/files/*
in terminal ^^^
what was it supposed to do that gave me no errors
if that doesnt work  open the terminal and  gksu nautilus   then maneuver to the  location in home  and see if you can delete them then
that should have removed all files under  Trash/files
however when you gksy nautilus it will open the root diretory so click File system  then home  then your name etc etc
sorry gksudo nautilus
that sudo command you gave me worked everything seems to be working again thank you so much
very cool :)
i would save that command in a text file for later use :)
